League.column_description: country id; the unique id for countries

Match.column_description: match api id; the id of the match api
home team api id; the id of the home team api
away team api id; the id of the away team api
home team goal; the goal of the home team
away team goal; the goal of the away team
shot on; the shot on goal of the match
Match.value_description: commonsense reasoning: A shot on goal is a shot that enters the goal or would have entered the goal if it had not been blocked by the goalkeeper or another defensive player.

Match.column_description: shot off; the shot off goal of the match, which is the opposite of shot on
foul commit; the fouls occurred in the match
the cards given in the match
Balls sent into the opposition team's area from a wide position in the match
Ball goes out of play for a corner kick in the match
The duration from a player taking over the ball in the match

Player.column_description: player api id; the id of the player api
player federation international football association api id; the id of the player fifa api

Player.value_description: e.g. 1992-02-29 00:00:00 commonsense reasoning: Player A is older than player B means that A's birthday is earlier than B's

Player_Attributes.column_description: player federation international football association api id; the id of the player fifa api
player api id; the id of the player api
the overall rating of the player
Player_Attributes.value_description: commonsense reasoning: The rating is between 0-100 which is calculated by FIFA. Higher overall rating means the player has a stronger overall strength.
commonsense reasoning: The potential score is between 0-100 which is calculated by FIFA. Higher potential score means that the player has more potential

Player_Attributes.column_description: preferred foot; the player's preferred foot when attacking
attacking work rate; the player's attacking work rate
Player_Attributes.value_description: commonsense reasoning:  high: implies that the player is going to be in all of your attack moves  medium: implies that the player will select the attack actions he will join in  low: remain in his position while the team attacks

commonsense reasoning:  high: remain in his position and defense while the team attacks  medium: implies that the player will select the defensive actions he will join in  low: implies that the player is going to be in all of your attack moves instead of defensing

commonsense reasoning: Cross is a long pass into the opponent's goal towards the header of sixth-yard teammate. The crossing score is between 0-100 which measures the tendency/frequency of crosses in the box. Higher potential score means that the player performs better in crossing actions.

Player_Attributes.column_description: heading accuracy; the player's heading accuracy
short passing; the player's short passing score
free kick accuracy; the player's free kick accuracy
long passing; the player's long passing score
ball control; the player's ball control score
sprint speed; the player's sprint speed
shot power; the player's shot power
long shots; the player's long shots score
standing tackle; the player's standing tackle score
sliding tackle; the player's sliding tackle score
goalkeep diving; the player's goalkeep diving score
goalkeep handling; the player's goalkeep diving score
goalkeep kicking; the player's goalkeep kicking score
goalkeep positioning; the player's goalkeep positioning score
goalkeep reflexes; the player's goalkeep reflexes score

Team.column_description: team api id; the id of the team api
team federation international football association api id; the id of the team fifa api
team long name; the team's long name
team short name; the team's short name

Team_Attributes.column_description: the unique id for teams
team federation international football association api id; the id of the team fifa api
team api id; the id of the team api
Date
build Up Play Speed; the speed in which attacks are put together
Team_Attributes.value_description: the score which is between 1-00 to measure the team's attack speed

Team_Attributes.column_description: build Up Play Speed Class; the speed class
build Up Play Dribbling; the tendency/ frequency of dribbling
build Up Play Dribbling Class; the dribbling class
build Up Play Passing; affects passing distance and support from teammates
build Up Play Passing Class; the passing class
build Up Play Positioning Class; A team's freedom of movement in the 1st two thirds of the pitch
chance Creation Passing; Amount of risk in pass decision and run support
chance Creation Passing Class; the chance creation passing class
chance Creation Crossing; The tendency / frequency of crosses into the box
chance Creation Crossing Class; the chance creation crossing class
chance Creation Shooting; The tendency / frequency of shots taken
chance Creation Shooting Class; the chance creation shooting class
chance Creation Positioning Class; A teams freedom of movement in the final third of the pitch
defence Pressure; Affects how high up the pitch the team will start pressuring
defence Pressure Class; the defence pressure class
defence Aggression; Affect the teams approach to tackling the ball possessor
defence Aggression Class; the defence aggression class
defence Team Width; Affects how much the team will shift to the ball side
defence Team Width Class; the defence team width class
defence Defender Line Class; Affects the shape and strategy of the defence
